players.name: Shallow-Sea Scout
players.clue: The chest is hidden no deeper than four rows from the northern edge.

players.name: Prime Numerist
players.clue: Its column is a prime sentinel: only 2, 3, 5 or 7 admit the prize.

players.name: Parity Jester
players.clue: When row and column dance together, their sum laughs an odd laugh.

players.name: Humble Tactician
players.clue: The row bows to the column â€” the rank is strictly smaller than its file.

players.name: Western Cartographer
players.clue: Travel east of the letter F; only G, H, I or J lie beyond the map's tear.

players.name: Three-Beat Chronomancer
players.clue: March the rows in threes; the treasure rests on the second beat each time.
